trans-unit.source: Build and deploy the BizTalk Services project
trans-unit.target: Build and deploy the BizTalk Services project

trans-unit.source: In this topic we connect the <token>one-way</token> to <token>azure_2</token> blob and then build the <token>af_integration</token> project.
trans-unit.target: In this topic we connect the <token>one-way</token> to <token>azure_2</token> blob and then build the <token>af_integration</token> project.

trans-unit.source: To connect the components and build the project
trans-unit.target: To connect the components and build the project

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Connector</embeddedLabel> from the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel> on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> designer surface then connect the <embeddedLabel>PurchaseOrderBridge</embeddedLabel> with <embeddedLabel>PO_Blob</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Connector</embeddedLabel> from the <embeddedLabel>Toolbox</embeddedLabel> on the <token>msgflow_proj</token> designer surface then connect the <embeddedLabel>PurchaseOrderBridge</embeddedLabel> with <embeddedLabel>PO_Blob</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Select the connection between the bridge and the blob, then select the <embeddedLabel>Filter Condition</embeddedLabel> property from the Properties pane.
trans-unit.target: Select the connection between the bridge and the blob, then select the <embeddedLabel>Filter Condition</embeddedLabel> property from the Properties pane.

trans-unit.source: In the <embeddedLabel>Route Filter Configuration</embeddedLabel> dialog box, select <embeddedLabel>Match All</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the <embeddedLabel>Route Filter Configuration</embeddedLabel> dialog box, select <embeddedLabel>Match All</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that all the messages that are processed by the bridge are routed to the blob.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that all the messages that are processed by the bridge are routed to the blob.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> project, and then select <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_PurchaseOrder</embeddedLabel> project, and then select <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Once the build succeeds, right-click the project then select <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Once the build succeeds, right-click the project then select <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: In the deployment window, the <embeddedLabel>Deployment Endpoint</embeddedLabel> is a read only entity and the value is derived from the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL/Namespace</embeddedLabel> set in the message flow surface.
trans-unit.target: In the deployment window, the <embeddedLabel>Deployment Endpoint</embeddedLabel> is a read only entity and the value is derived from the <embeddedLabel>BizTalk Service URL/Namespace</embeddedLabel> set in the message flow surface.

trans-unit.source: However, you must provide the ACS Namespace for <token>af_integration</token>, Issuer Name, and Shared Secret.
trans-unit.target: However, you must provide the ACS Namespace for <token>af_integration</token>, Issuer Name, and Shared Secret.

trans-unit.source: The <token>vs_current_short</token> Output pane displays the deployment progress and result.
trans-unit.target: The <token>vs_current_short</token> Output pane displays the deployment progress and result.

trans-unit.source: The URL where the <token>bridge</token> is deployed is also displayed in the Output pane.
trans-unit.target: The URL where the <token>bridge</token> is deployed is also displayed in the Output pane.
